content: utopia hat - mimi christien 2019  size adult materials worsted weight yarn 5 5 mm hook stitches used chain double_crochet fpdc   crown  round 1 12 double_crochet in magic_ring or into first chain round 2 increase in each st - 24 double_crochet note starting in round 3 chain 2 to start round does not count as a double_crochet join to double_crochet at end of row ignoring turning chain round 3 fpdc in first st 2 double_crochet in next st repeat around - 36 double_crochet round 4 fpdc in first st double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next st repeat around - 48 double_crochet round 5 work even fpdc in fpdc double_crochet in double_crochet - 48 double_crochet this ends the fpdc spokes in the crown texture starts on the next round  body  note on increase rounds some fpdc will end up being worked in fpdc and some double_crochet will end up on top of double_crochet - this is fine and not visible in the finished product round 6 - increase round alternate fpdc and double_crochet around starting with double_crochet and increasing every 4th stitch e g double_crochet fpdc double_crochet fpdc + double_crochet fpdc double_crochet fpdc double_crochet + fpdc etc - 60 double_crochet round 7 work even alternating fpdc and double_crochet opposite of what they were on the last round fpdc in double_crochet double_crochet in fpdc - 60 double_crochet round 8 - increase round similar to round 6 alternate fpdc and double_crochet around starting with double_crochet and increasing every 5th stitch - 72 double_crochet -- to make a larger hat increase into every 4th stitch instead on round 8 - final count will be 75 double_crochet -- to make a smaller hat increase into every 6th stitch instead on round 8 - final count will be 70 double_crochet rounds 9-15 work even alternating fpdc and double_crochet opposite of the last row fpdc in double_crochet double_crochet in fpdc - 72 double_crochet -- add more or fewer row for a longer or shorter hat  edging  round 16 single_crochet in each st round 17 double_crochet in each st rounds 18-21 fpdc in first st bpdc in next st repeat around round 22 single_crochet in each st finish off
